GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

comments.article_title: Living in the shadow of a great man
comments.body: I carry a log — yes. Is it funny to you? It is not to me.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a newly posted comment object

exampleResponse.body: I am commenting on this post from an airplane, does that make me a bird? Careful, Sam. Too much pondering and you'll wake up a cat, vaguely disappointed.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

exampleResponse.article_title: Living in the shadow of a great man

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its comment id, no content returned

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles (sorting query).description: serves an array of all articles sorted by appropriate article fields in ascending or descending order

GET /api/articles (topics query).description: serves an array of all articles filtered by an existing topic
